channel.title: Vegan on GETSOMEPEAS

item.title: Pancakes
item.description: These pancakes are really simple to make. Ingredients Let’s start with the vegan version: Ingredients 300g wheat or spelt flour 500g water a little salt some fat for frying (e.g. olive oil) Or if you’d rather have the dairy version: Ingredients 300g wheat or spelt flour 1 or 2 eggs <500g water or milk (fill up enough liquid so that together with the eggs you’re at 500g liquids) a little salt some fat for frying (e.
